div.p:
I want you to make inquiries as to whether the
Bann or any other vessel is to be sent out. She
must have speed. If so all right if not then
I must buy one for myself for I have no notion of
sticking fast here. You must appropriate at least
Â£2,000 of the money you have in charge for the
purpose ...... But we must have her
and that quickly too at whatever cost I shall
pay all myself rather than not succeed ...
... Our present opinion is that the difficulty may
be overcome during about 8 months annually but
the steamer must be of sufficient power to cross from
side to side according as the smooth reaches indicate
...... now I expect my Dear Young if the
Government don't mean to send out a steamer of
sufficient power to go 12 or 14 Knots I must have
one at my own expense, I think this the pathway
into the interior. I hope the interior region will
by the energy and industry of our countrymen become
an extensive producer of the raw material ...
... Let Washington know that I shall buy one
myself ... Tell him I desired you to tell him
frankly that it is a case of Government or no Government
the steamer must be got.
